bib: Loftus, Dudley, trans. The Exposition of Dionysius Syrus Written above 900 Years since on the Evangelist St. Mark; Wherewith Are Bound up Several Other Tracts of the Same Authour, and an Ancient Syriack Scholia on the Four Evangelists, as Also Some Persian, Armenian, and Greek Antiquities. Dublin: Benjamin Tooke, 1672. http://archive.org/details/bim_early-english-books-1641-1700_the-exposition-of-dionys_dionysius-syrus_1672.
